DOC.HEADLINE: NEWS , TIPS & BARGAINS ; COURTING A TOUR IN WASHINGTON
DOC.TEXT: Have a hankering to watch the Supreme Court in action ? The court is open_to the public from 9 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Monday through Friday , but guided tours ( led by a court staff_member ) are available only if they have been arranged in_advance through your congressional representative ' s office.The court recommends making arrangements at least two months in_advance . The alternative is to attend a free lecture ( given every hour on the half-hour beginning at 9:30 a.m. ) and then tour the building on_your_own . You may also watch the court in session . For more information , call the court information line , ( 202 ) 479-3211 .
